genel.title: INSIGHT: Open home loan application
descriptions: Latest event: Require additional proof of employment (communicated May 5th)
genel.extra: It looks like your application is still in underwriting. The underwriters have asked for additional proof of your employment. That's pretty common if you're not on a W-2. Usually getting a letter from your employer confirming your employment status is enough.
genel.why: The customer asked about the status of their home loan

genel.title: INSIGHT: CD coming to term in next 90 days
genel.why: This CD is maturing and the customer has not elected to re-invest. They risk loosing out on current high CD rates.
